/usr/bin/c++  -I/usr/local/include -I. -pthread -std=c++11                                          -Wall -Wno-switch -Wno-unused-variable -Wno-sign-compare -Wl,--no-as-needed                                          -MMD -MP -rdynamic -Wno-reorder -O2 -g   -Wl,--no-as-needed -Wl,--as-needed                                                        -ldl                                                        -lrdmacm -libverbs                                                        -pthread -lpthread -rdynamic CMakeFiles/rdma_server.dir/src/network/rdma/rdma_server.cpp.o CMakeFiles/rdma_server.dir/src/network/work_request.cpp.o CMakeFiles/rdma_server.dir/src/memory_replication/persistent_store.cpp.o -o rdma_server   -L/usr/local/lib  -L/home/fukan/zdx/Sift/third_party/rocksdb/build  -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib:/home/fukan/zdx/Sift/third_party/rocksdb/build -lrdmacm -libverbs
